Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2013 09:52PM lindapebo wrote: Hello, I had surgery on July 15th for DCIS and have A follow-up appointment tomorrow, July 25th to get results  of surgery.  The surgeon thinks he got all the cancer but can't be sure unitl the pathology report is back.  He said it had "rays" and needs to make sure he got all of them. I have a problem with my husband understanding what I am going through because he had a stroke 7 years ago and his emotions just aren't there.  He does go to my appointments but not sure if he realizes how serious the situation is.  He doesn't hug me or show physical emotion and sometimes I just need a hug. I am praying I don't need another surgery but the waiting is the hardest.  I take care of everything at home.
